# Changelog

## 2.0.0 – Oct 15, 2020

Same as 2.0.0-beta.1.

### BREAKING CHANGES

- Support the font variants used by Shields:
  - 10px Verdana
  - bold 10px Verdana
  - 11px Verdana
  - bold 11px Helvetica

## 2.0.0-beta.1 – Oct 11, 2020

### BREAKING CHANGES

- Support the font variants used by Shields:
  - 10px Verdana
  - bold 10px Verdana
  - 11px Verdana
  - bold 11px Helvetica

## 2.0.0-beta.0 – Oct 11, 2020

### BREAKING CHANGES

- Support 10px and 11px Verdana, in normal and bold.

## 1.0.0 – Apr 12, 2018

- Update dependencies.
- Stable API.

## 0.1.1 – Nov 15, 2018

- Require the JSON file (instead of `loadSync`-ing it) to play well with
  module bundlers.

## 0.1.0 – Nov 13, 2018

Initial release.
